definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The machine and plants becomes co-dependent. " Esparza says."
sentences.chinese: 机器与植物成了很好的合作者。

sentences.english: Kish and his collaborator Sergey Bezrukov of the National Institutes of Health in Bethesda, Maryland, think so.
sentences.chinese: Kish和他的合作者认为是这样的。

sentences.english: But I'm waiting for the number-cruncher person.
sentences.chinese: 但是我还在等待合作者。

sentences.english: Identify all occurrences of code that create or obtain the collaborator.
sentences.chinese: 标识创建或获取合作者的代码的所有出现。

sentences.english: Projects are invite-only, and users can choose who the collaborators will be and determine permissions for each person.
sentences.chinese: 所有项目都是邀请制，用户可以选择合作者及其权限。

sentences.english: BWell I'm definitely a team player as well as being highly self-motivated.
sentences.chinese: 我绝对是个好的合作者而且有很强的进取心。

sentences.english: We are very serious business man, sure we are your very right cooperator .
sentences.chinese: 我们是很严肃的事人，我们相信你说得很对合作者。

sentences.english: It should allow the dynamic substitution of compatible partners.
sentences.chinese: 它应该允许动态替换相容的合作者。

sentences.english: He and several collaborators reported that red cars attract insects.
sentences.chinese: 他和其他合作者报告说红色车招虫子。

sentences.english: Have a collaborator stand at the exit.
sentences.chinese: 让一位合作者站在出口处。

sentences.english: Competition in the marketplace is competition among cooperators.
sentences.chinese: 市场上的竞争是合作者之间的竞争。

sentences.english: Let partners assured satisfaction for tourists, and I was operating objectives.
sentences.chinese: 让合作者放心，让旅游者满意，是我社的经营目标。

sentences.english: Interviewee: Well I’m definitely a team player as well as being highly self-motivated.
sentences.chinese: 我绝对是个好的合作者而且有很强的进取心。

sentences.english: A partner will likely come to the rescue by Saturday, and help you smooth things out.
sentences.chinese: 周六可能会有一个合作者来帮助你来助你顺利。

sentences.english: Mr. Yan has since bought out his other partners.
sentences.chinese: 严兆强后来买下了其他合作者手中的所有股份。

sentences.english: On the contrary, Dr. Xue was a very weak collaborator.
sentences.chinese: 相反的，薛博士是一名很差劲合作者。

definition: to cooperate/to collaborate/to work together/cooperation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to form an alliance/to ally oneself with/allied with/aligned/to bond with
